snippet: Although retailers had better-than-expected sales, the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index fell for a second day.
abstract: Stocks are mixed in light trading, with the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index falling for a second day, as a slump in technology and financial shares reverses an earlier rally.
lead_paragraph: Although retailers had better-than-expected sales, the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index fell for a second day.

headline.seo: Trading Mixed as Tech and Financials Falter
headline.main: Tech and Financials Slump, Thwarting a Market Rally
headline.print_headline: Tech and Financials Slump, Thwarting a Market Rally
